about_the_game:
The official supporter pack for A Night In Berlin!

THE OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK
All 8 of Zotsky's heart pumping tracks featured in A Night In Berlin, in the best quality possible!

HIGH-RESOLUTION WALLPAPERS
3 HD wallpapers each for desktop and mobile.

BEHIND THE SCENES DOCUMENTARY
A 13-minute mini-documentary featuring a behind the scenes look at the development of A Night In Berlin. Including interviews with the developers and cast, as well as a look at early builds of the game.

After purchasing and downloading the Supporter Pack, the OST will be playable in the Steam Music Player. To access the documentary and wallpapers, go into A Night In Berlin's Properties and find the "Browse Local Files" button. This will take you to A Night In Berlin's game directory, which will have the Supporter Pack included within it.

content_descriptors.notes:
A Night In Berlin is a Third-Person Shooter that features frequent scenes of violence and gore, tobacco use, strong language, and one scene including suicide.

The Supporter Pack + Soundtrack includes a behind the scenes video featuring gameplay with the previously stated content.
